articles.author: Mary Ilyushina, Robyn Dixon
articles.title: Putin, facing war crimes arrest, will skip BRICS summit in S. Africa - The Washington Post
articles.description: Putin's decision not to attend a summit of the BRICS group of nations ends a diplomatic quandary over whether the Russian leader would be arrested on an International Criminal Court warrant.
articles.content:

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Russia's Putin will not attend BRICS summit: South Africa - Hindustan Times
articles.description: By mutual agreement, President Vladimir Putin of the Russian Federation will not attend the summit, a spokesman for President Cyril Ramaphosa, said. | World News
articles.content:
Russian President Vladimir Putin will not attend a BRICS nations summit in South Africa next month, the country's presidency said on Wednesday, ending months of speculation.
